main module¶

main.home()¶

This is a procedure defining the control flow on the home page of the website. :return: An HTML response to the client

main.login(form)¶

This function matches inputted Login data with backend :param form: A FlaskForm object containing a set of inputted fields :return: boolean indicating whether the login was successful

main.signup()¶

This is a procedure defining the control flow on the Sign in page of the website. A form can be submitted for backend validation and processing. :return: An HTML response to the client with the HTML template parameters filled in

main.signup_handler(form)¶

Processes the POST request of a sign up form and adds a user to the database :param form: a FlaskForm object containing the inputted fields :return: Void

main.signup_not_empty(form)¶

Determines whether a field in the submitted sign up form is empty. :param form: a FlaskForm object containing the inputted fields :return: boolean indicating True if valid, False otherwise

main.splash()¶

This is a procedure defining the control flow on the splash (default) page of the website. A form can be submitted for backend validation and processing. :return: An HTML response to the client with the HTML template parameters filled in
